import React, { Component } from 'react' import './App.css' import '../assets/css/bootstrap.min.css' import '../assets/css/font-awesome.css' import next from '../assets/images/next.svg' import phone from '../assets/images/mail_white.svg' import dcl from '../assets/mockups/DCL.png' import safe from '../assets/mockups/SAFE.png' import covid from '../assets/mockups/Covid.png' import sparq from '../assets/mockups/SparQ.png' import sayblue from '../assets/mockups/SAYBLUE.png' import verve from '../assets/mockups/VERVE.png' import qweb from '../assets/mockups/QWEB.png' import fiscal from '../assets/mockups/FiscalFresh.png' import Slider from "react-slick"; import "slick-carousel/slick/slick.css"; import "slick-carousel/slick/slick-theme.css"; export class PortSlider extends Component { render() { var settings = { dots: false, infinite: true, speed: 60000, autoplay: true, cssEase: 'linear', arrows:false, autoplaySpeed: 0, responsive: [{ breakpoint: 900, settings: { autoplay: true, arrows:false, autoplaySpeed: 4000, slidesToShow: 1, speed: 2000, slidesToScroll: 1, initialSlide: 2 } }], slidesToShow: 3, slidesToScroll: 8 }; return (
Hello World
Hello World
) } } export default PortSlider
